name: The Causeway
description:
An awe-inspiring VR experience where the magical pillars react to the sound around you. Keep an eye on the ocean however.

This was made for the Oculus GO

Here is a playthrough video for everyone without a  device.

The Causeway was created by a team nine at SAE Qantm Melbourne.

  • Elliot Gordeno
  • David Tran
